ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: The RJDBC package is an implementation of R's DBI interface using JDBC as a back-end. This allows R to connect to any DBMS that has a JDBC driver.
The RJDBC package is an implementation of R's DBI interface using JDBC as a back-end. This allows R to connect to any DBMS that has a JDBC driver.

name: r-rjdbc
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.2-10" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-rjdbc
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/RJDBC_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/RJDBC/RJDBC_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 37f347aa23319ed44cb224f9fc1f694420c3a836b6da39381db572690e7f6219

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-dbi
    - r-rjava >=0.4_15
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-dbi
    - r-rjava >=0.4_15

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('RJDBC')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('RJDBC')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.rforge.net/RJDBC/
  license: MIT
  summary: The RJDBC package is an implementation of R's DBI interface using JDBC as a back-end. This allows R to connect to any DBMS that has a JDBC driver.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - fhoehle
    - xhochy

# Package: RJDBC
# Version: 0.2-7.1
# Title: Provides Access to Databases Through the JDBC Interface
# Author: Simon Urbanek <Simon.Urbanek@r-project.org>
# Maintainer: Simon Urbanek <Simon.Urbanek@r-project.org>
# Depends: methods, DBI, rJava (>= 0.4-15), R (>= 2.4.0)
# Description: The RJDBC package is an implementation of R's DBI interface using JDBC as a back-end. This allows R to connect to any DBMS that has a JDBC driver.
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# URL: http://www.rforge.net/RJDBC/
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-04-16 13:03:02 UTC; hornik
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-04-16 15:01:33 UTC
